### Plant-microbe interactions

We study the infection of barley (*Hordeum vulgare*) with the powdery mildew fungus *Blumeria graminis* f. sp. *hordei* (*Bgh*). 

Click on [Research](https://saurlab.com/research)  for more detail on our interests
